```{r}
 city <- c("Tuguegarao City", "Manila", "Iloilo City", "Tacloban", "Samal Island", "Davao City")
print(city)
```
```{r}
 temp<- c(42, 39, 34, 34, 30, 27)
print(temp)
```
```{r}
 df_temp <- data.frame(city, temp)
print(df_temp)
```
```{r}
names(df_temp) <- c("City", "Temperature")
print(df_temp)
```
```{r}
str(df_temp)
```
```{r}
 df_temp[3:4, ]
```
```{r}
# City with Highest Temperature
df_temp[which.max(df_temp$Temperature), ]

# City with Lowest Temperature
df_temp[which.min(df_temp$Temperature), ]
```
```{r}
vector_data <- c(1:8, 11:14)
mat_a <- matrix(vector_data, nrow = 3, ncol = 4)
print(mat_a)
```
```{r}

print(mat_b)
```

